TEXT.English: [TAB]A Llogor was a place where Albanians would hide munitions with which to fight their Turkish, Serbian, and Montenegrin oppressors. Especially in the early 1900s these were important when Albanians from all regions were uniting to reclaim their land from the Ottoman conquerors: one of the movies about the war for the declaration of Albania's independence is about a homemade gunpowder mill in the mountains that was used to produce the ammunition the men waged war against their enemies with.
